message.raw:
Finished new features for Camera device.
Is backward compatible with existing API.
Camera devices can now have a Trigger passed in as a parent instead of the port
and connection describing a digital output. In this case a trigger will be
instantiated for them.

New code checks labscript version and raises an error if too old for
the version TriggerableDevice was introduced.
